title: Story Generator
description: A single-page application that allows users to create personalized stories based on their input preferences

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Primary interface for users to input story preferences and generate stories

ui_components: Story generation form with input fields
state: userInput: { genre: string, characters: string, setting: string, length: string }
interactions: User fills out form fields and clicks generate button
Loading state displays during story generation
Story appears in preview area after generation
User can download generated story as text file
User can reset form to start new story
Error handling for invalid inputs or generation failures
acceptance_criteria: Form fields include genre, characters, setting, and length selectors
Story generation produces coherent narrative based on inputs
Loading indicator appears during generation process
Generated stories display properly formatted in preview area
Download functionality creates text file with story content
Form resets properly to allow new story generation
Error messages display appropriately for invalid inputs
Responsive design works on mobile and desktop devices
All form fields are validated before generation attempt
